scripts.dev:
echo 'This is a monorepo. Please run one of the following commands based on your needs:
- For SDK development: cd packages/sdks && yarn start
- For SDK tests: cd packages/sdks-tests && yarn dev
- For specific framework development:
  * React: cd packages/sdks && yarn start:react
  * Angular: cd packages/sdks && yarn start:angular
  * Vue: cd packages/sdks && yarn start:vue
  * Qwik: cd packages/sdks && yarn start:qwik
  * Solid: cd packages/sdks && yarn start:solid
  * React Native: cd packages/sdks && yarn start:reactNative
  * NextJS: cd packages/sdks && yarn start:rsc'
